name: Episode Chapter Vol. I (demo)
description:
You're stuck under the sea and can only communicate using morse code.  Try to escape, from this terrifying reality.

Trigger warning : depending on your choice the game could display mature theme

Click any key to type morse. Press right click or maintain any key for 1.5 sec to send the line. Type the action you wanna do.

You can send a line containing only part of a command.
https://wizardtoad.net/linktree/
